p: Areas of interest include use for osteoarthritis pain [ 88, 96, 97, 98], other types of pain (oncologic, neuropathic) [ 99], immune-mediated and inflammatory allergic disorders [ 100], cardio-vascular and respiratory conditions [ 101], and epilepsy [ 102, 103]. According to the scientific literature review, cannabinoids are mainly used in the treatment of pain, especially osteoarthritis pain.
